page.title: 02PRINCIPAL FEATURES
page.content:
1.Most of the shopping and commercial area of the town is concentrated around the one main street called Cowgate and Townhead which runs through the centre of the town.
2.Forth and Clyde canal This was the first canal built in Scotland.It traverses the centre of the town at right angles to the main street.In the past Kirkintilloch was an important staging point on the canal for traffic between Edinburgh and Glasgow.
3.Auld Kirk Museum Dating from 1644 this former church,(legend has it that Mary Queen of Scots worshipped there and possibly Bonnie Prince Charlie),is now a museum of the town.
